1081830.name: Blood And Mead
1081830.description:
From the Iron Coast to the treacherous Black Kingdom; Join Ulric, a hatchet-wielding barbarian on a dramatic mead fueled quest for blood and revenge!

FEATURES

  • Unnecessarily brutal and bloody combat

  • Unlock and Learn devastating combat skills to decimate your enemies

  • Enter Berserker-Mode and brutally finish your enemies

  • Dozens of unique and terrifying foes, including the Crying Maiden of the Black Keep

  • Face off against huge formidable bosses

  • Travel across many unique lands, from the lush Iron Coast to the sinister realms beyond The Teeth

  • Enjoy a captivating story filled with warrior shenanigans that plays out across a brutal fantasy landscape

  • Treat your ears to a delightful sound track filled with dark folk-metal flair.
1081830.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
